name: Dryad Quest DX
description:
IMPORTANT: READ THE INFORMATION BELOW BEFORE PLAYING, IT'S IMPORTANT  UPDATE: SIGN HAS BEEN FIXED, DOWNLOAD 1.1

Controls: 

  • Arrow Keys: movement
  • Z - Shoot
  • X - Shield (shield breaks after taking too much damage, and has to refresh)
  • Shift - Dash
What is this game? How do I play it?

Dryad Quest DX is an action game/dungeon crawler inspired by the old-school Zelda games. There are 3 areas to explore, and 2 bosses to defeat. Fight your way through the levels, always remembering to heal up on the circles found on the ground. 

 Firstly, you will need to go EAST to beat Shrub-Niggurath, and become able to pass through all of the purple squares. Then you go WEST, and through the Dark Forest to face the Wendigo Knight.

Thank you for playing the game!
